body:
Unban my brother PsychoStoner (Ban Me Instead)  

Yes i was the one who put that link in chat while he was away but I really didn't think my brother was going to get banned.

title: Unban my brother PsychoStoner

replies.body: How do we know this isnt you on your alt account trying to save your better account

replies.body:
If its his account, he is responsible for it.
email support@avicus.net for the best possible response you can get
